image.alt: Smiling patients and friendly team at Maxfield Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Maxfield Orthodontics has been creating beautiful smiles in the Salt Lake Valley for over 40 years. Dr. Blake Maxfield joined his father’s practice in 2009 and continues a tradition of multi-generation care focused on natural, broad smiles.

Our team combines light-force tooth movement and modern orthodontic technology with a family-friendly approach. We offer comfortable, personalized care and flexible scheduling so patients of all ages feel confident and well cared for.

items.title: Experienced Practice
items.text: Serving the Salt Lake Valley for 40+ years with multi-generation care and continuity you can trust.

items.title: Modern Technology
items.text: We use Damon Ultima, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Spark clear aligners to shorten treatment time and improve comfort.

items.title: Flexible Financing
items.text: Complimentary consultations plus in-house, interest-free financing and payment plans to fit your budget.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Blake Maxfield, D.D.S., M.S.D., leads the practice and carries on his family’s orthodontic legacy. He earned his dental degree and completed his orthodontic residency and Master of Science in Dentistry at Virginia Commonwealth University, and has published peer-reviewed research. Dr. Maxfield served as President of the Utah Association of Orthodontists (2021–2022) and embraces modern techniques like Damon Ultima and clear aligner therapy.

image.alt: Dr. Blake Maxfield, D.D.S., M.S.D., lead orthodontist at Maxfield Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Dr. White, D.D.S., M.S.D., provides clear, patient-focused orthodontic care at our Taylorsville and Cottonwood Heights offices. He completed his dental degree at the University of Utah and his orthodontic specialty training at Virginia Commonwealth University, and he offers care in Spanish for families who prefer to communicate in their native language.

image.alt: Dr. White, D.D.S., M.S.D., orthodontist at Maxfield Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We offer braces, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Spark clear aligners, custom retainers, and professional teeth whitening to meet every smile need.

testimonials.author: Emily J.
testimonials.testimonial: So far our experience with Dr. Maxfield and his staff has been more than fantastic! As an experienced dental hygienist I have very high expectations for both my patients and my own children. If you are looking for skilled and honest orthodontic care look no further!

testimonials.author: Maureen R.
testimonials.testimonial: My second go-around with braces, this time as an adult, and couldn’t be happier. I wish I had this team the first time around. Dr. Blake is truly a master at what he does and his staff is fantastic! I will miss seeing these people every few months.

seo.page_description: Maxfield Orthodontics offers personalized orthodontic care in the Salt Lake Valley: Damon Ultima, Invisalign®, Spark, retainers, and flexible financing.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, Invisalign, Spark, braces, retainers, Salt Lake Valley

og_meta.title: Home - Maxfield Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Trusted orthodontic care in the Salt Lake Valley offering modern braces and clear aligner options, complimentary consultations, and flexible financing.

image.alt: Waiting area and reception at Maxfield Orthodontics Taylorsville office

paragraphs.text: For more than 40 years, Maxfield Orthodontics has helped people across the Salt Lake Valley build confident, healthy smiles. We treat each patient as an individual and focus on care that improves both oral health and self-esteem.
Our practice emphasizes modern, patient-centered treatment using up-to-date technology and light, gentle forces to move teeth efficiently and comfortably for long-lasting results.

We offer a full range of options, including traditional braces, clear braces, Spark and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners, plus professional whitening when appropriate, so every treatment fits your lifestyle.
Between flexible scheduling and in-house, interest-free financing, we make starting orthodontic care straightforward so you can begin enjoying the benefits of a well cared-for smile.

Dr. Blake Maxfield, D.D.S., M.S.D., brings extensive clinical experience and a focus on modern orthodontic techniques. He has published research in orthodontic journals, including a primary-author paper in the American Journal of Orthodontics (March 2012), and served as President of the Utah Association of Orthodontists (2021–2022).

Dr. Maxfield has particular experience with clear aligner therapy, including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, and participated in clinical trials for the Damon Ultima bracket. He emphasizes individualized treatment planning to achieve broad, natural-looking smiles while prioritizing patient comfort.

image.alt: Dr. Blake Maxfield smiling in office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Maxfield completed his Doctor of Dental Surgery and went on to earn his Master of Science during his orthodontic residency at the Medical College of Virginia (Virginia Commonwealth University). He also completed undergraduate studies at the University of Utah after time at BYU.

At home Dr. Maxfield enjoys family life with his wife Michelle, a stepson Jameson, and their children. He is an avid sports fan and stays active with basketball, golf, tennis, and skiing. He values connecting with patients and helping them feel confident in their smiles.

image.alt: Dr. Blake Maxfield smiling in office

paragraphs.text: Dr. White, D.D.S., M.S.D., provides personalized orthodontic care across our locations with a focus on clear communication and patient comfort. He currently sees patients at the Taylorsville office and supports Cottonwood Heights, and he is proud to offer care in Spanish for families who prefer Spanish-language communication.

Dr. White earned his dental degree from the University of Utah and completed his orthodontic residency and Master of Science in Dentistry at Virginia Commonwealth University. He brings a patient-focused approach and clear explanations to every stage of treatment.

Outside the office Dr. White enjoys college sports, home renovation projects, and time with his wife Jenna and their daughter Macie. He values building strong relationships with patients and their families to support successful treatment.

slides.alt: Taylorsville treatment area with modern equipment

paragraphs.text: Maxfield Orthodontics supports our local communities through professional leadership and accessible care. Dr. Blake Maxfield served as President of the Utah Association of Orthodontists (2021–2022), and our team works to make orthodontic care welcoming for all families. We also offer Spanish-language care through Dr. White to improve access for Spanish-speaking patients.

og_meta.title: About Us | Maxfield Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Meet Dr. Blake Maxfield, Dr. White, and the Maxfield Orthodontics team. Modern, patient-focused orthodontic care in Taylorsville and Cottonwood Heights.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: We are always excited about meeting new patients and want your initial consultation to be an informative yet enjoyable experience. Our team is committed to providing the highest quality of care using the best technologies and products on the market.

At your first appointment, your treatment coordinator will take a complimentary x-ray to assist Dr. Maxfield with his diagnosis. He will complete a thorough exam, record his findings, and create a customized treatment plan outlining recommended treatment, expected length, and estimated costs. Please have all financial decision makers present so we can review insurance and payment options together.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: As a courtesy to our patients, we provide a complimentary benefit check to review your insurance coverage. Coverage for orthodontic treatment varies by carrier and plan; our team will help you maximize your benefits.
We offer in-house, interest-free financing and flexible payment plans to make treatment affordable. Secure online bill pay and auto-payment options are available for added convenience.

To save time at your first visit, complete your new patient forms online. After scheduling, you will receive an email or text with a link to the forms; if you do not receive them, you can access the First Visit Form below.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

seo.page_description: Start your first visit at Maxfield Orthodontics. Learn what to expect, complete new patient forms, and schedule a complimentary consultation online.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, first visit, new patient forms, financing, Maxfield Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | Maxfield Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your first visit at Maxfield Orthodontics. Learn what to expect, complete new patient forms, and schedule a complimentary consultation online.

paragraphs.text: Damon Ultima braces combine a low-profile design with a sliding mechanism that reduces friction and improves comfort. Dr. Maxfield has used the Damon system for over 15 years to help patients reach their goals with fewer adjustments and predictable results.

Spark clear aligners offer a comfortable, discreet way to straighten teeth. Custom-fit trays are worn about 20 to 22 hours a day and are an excellent option for patients who want results without traditional brackets and wires.
Invisalign

Early orthodontic evaluation gives Dr. Maxfield a chance to guide jaw growth and intercept developing problems. When appropriate, early treatment can simplify later care and improve long-term results.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic evaluation

paragraphs.text: Adolescence is an ideal time for orthodontic care because most permanent teeth are present and growth can help achieve efficient tooth movement. Our teen-focused options balance effectiveness with discreet, comfortable appliances.

image.alt: Teen patient smiling during orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: There is no age limit for orthodontics. Adult treatment focuses on discreet, efficient options that fit busy lives, helping improve aesthetics, oral health, and bite function with minimal disruption.
Retainers preserve the smile you worked for. We provide both bonded and removable options and include multiple retainers after treatment to protect long-term results.
Consistent wear is the key to preventing relapse. Our team will recommend the best retainer type and schedule follow ups to keep your teeth in their ideal position.
We offer G.L.O.

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in our Emeryville office

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about orthodontic insurance, payment options, and how to schedule a consultation with our office.

You will pay less out of pocket if your insurance policy covers orthodontics. Many companies put a lifetime cap on benefits for orthodontic treatment that is separate from other dental insurance coverage. Every policy is different so you should speak to your insurance agent and let us review your policy to help you choose the right action for your situation. We will file all insurance claims after beginning treatment for you so everything is smooth and easy. We accept most insurances, so please ask.

Patients who want to pay for treatment upfront can receive up to three percent off on their fee. Feel free to take your time and speak to our friendly representatives to review all options and select a payment method that works for you. Payments Accepted: We accept all major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard for your convenience.
Sign up for a free consultation with us today! Schedule Appointment: https://www.drmaxfield.com/free-consultation
